hero.description: A passionate software developer specializing in creating innovative solutions with web technologies.

about.part1: I am Jackson Paredes Ferranti, a passionate software developer specializing in creating innovative solutions with web technologies. With 2 years of experience in web development, I have gained solid expertise in frontend development and the use of modern tech stacks.
about.part2: I am known for being proactive, curious, and detail-oriented, always seeking the most efficient ways to accomplish my work.
about.part3: My goal in the tech industry is to develop amazing solutions and products through software, working on projects that allow me to grow both professionally and personally in an exponential manner.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Develop, maintain and update reactive UI components, create custom CSS styles, state management, pages and routing.

experience.title: Web Designer
experience.description: Responsible for creating the visual design and layout of websites using HTML and CSS.
